arg.name: storage
arg.description: specify bag file storage {sqlite3, mcap}

arg.name: ouster_ns
arg.description: Override the default namespace of all ouster nodes

arg.name: sensor_hostname
arg.description: hostname or IP in dotted decimal form of the sensor

arg.name: udp_dest
arg.description: hostname or IP where the sensor will send data packets

arg.name: lidar_port
arg.description: port to which the sensor should send lidar data

arg.name: imu_port
arg.description: port to which the sensor should send imu data

arg.name: udp_profile_lidar
arg.description: lidar packet profile; possible values: { LEGACY, RNG19_RFL8_SIG16_NIR16, RNG15_RFL8_NIR8, RNG19_RFL8_SIG16_NIR16_DUAL, FUSA_RNG15_RFL8_NIR8_DUAL }

arg.name: lidar_mode
arg.description: resolution and rate; possible values: { 512x10, 512x20, 1024x10, 1024x20, 2048x10, 4096x5 }

arg.name: timestamp_mode
ptp_utc_tai_offset
arg.description: UTC/TAI offset in seconds to apply when using TIME_FROM_PTP_1588

arg.name: metadata
arg.description: path to write metadata file when receiving sensor data

arg.name: bag_file
arg.description: file name to use for the recorded bag file

arg.name: viz
arg.description: whether to run a rviz

arg.name: rviz_config
arg.description: optional rviz config file

arg.name: sensor_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the sensor_frame tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: lidar_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the os_lidar tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: imu_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the os_imu tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: point_cloud_frame
arg.description: which frame to be used when publishing PointCloud2 or LaserScan messages. Choose between the value of sensor_frame or lidar_frame, leaving this value empty would set lidar_frame to be the frame used when publishing these messages.

arg.name: pub_static_tf
arg.description: when this flag is set to True, the driver will broadcast the TF transforms for the imu/sensor/lidar frames. Prevent the driver from broadcasting TF transforms by setting this parameter to False.

arg.name: use_system_default_qos
arg.description: Use the default system QoS settings

arg.name: proc_mask
arg.description: use any combination of the 4 flags to enable or disable specific processors

arg.name: scan_ring
arg.description: use this parameter in conjunction with the SCAN flag and choose a value the range [0, sensor_beams_count)

arg.name: point_type
organized
arg.description: generate an organzied point cloud

arg.name: destagger
arg.description: enable or disable point cloud destaggering

arg.name: min_range
arg.description: minimum lidar range to consider (meters)

arg.name: max_range
arg.description: minimum lidar range to consider (meters)

arg.name: azimuth_window_start
arg.description: azimuth window start; values range [0, 360000] millidegrees

arg.name: azimuth_window_end
arg.description: azimuth window end; values range [0, 360000] millidegrees

arg.name: persist_config
arg.description: request the sensor to persist settings

arg.name: attempt_reconnect
arg.description: attempting to reconnect to the sensor after connection loss or sensor powered down

arg.name: dormant_period_between_reconnects
arg.description: wait time in seconds between reconnection attempts

arg.name: max_failed_reconnect_attempts
arg.description: maximum number of attempts trying to communicate with the sensor. Counter resets upon successful connection

arg.name: auto_start
arg.description: automatically configure and activate the node

arg.name: min_scan_valid_columns_ratio
arg.description: The minimum ratio of valid columns for processing the LidarScan [0, 1]

arg.name: v_reduction
arg.description: vertical beam reduction; available options: {1, 2, 4, 8, 16}

arg.name: mask_path
arg.description: path to an image file that will be used to mask parts of the pointcloud}

executable.cmd: ros2 bag record --output $(var bag_file) --storage $(var storage) /$(var ouster_ns)/imu_packets /$(var ouster_ns)/lidar_packets /$(var ouster_ns)/metadata
ros2 bag record --storage $(var storage) /$(var ouster_ns)/imu_packets /$(var ouster_ns)/lidar_packets /$(var ouster_ns)/metadata
